trans-unit.source: Provides the system implementation for displaying a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A rendszer valósítja meg a megjelenő egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ContextMenuService class provides attached properties that can be used to specify the appearance and position of a context menu.
trans-unit.target: A ContextMenuService osztály, amely segítségével adja meg a Megjelenés és a helyi menü helyzete csatolt tulajdonságok biztosít.

trans-unit.source: Many of the properties in the ContextMenuService class are also defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: A tulajdonságok a ContextMenuService osztály számos is határozzák meg a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is more convenient to set the properties by using the ContextMenuService class than by setting the properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Egyes esetekben célszerű a több mint ContextMenuService osztály használatával egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> tulajdonságainak beállításával tulajdonságainak beállításához

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> to be shared by multiple elements, but use the ContextMenuService class to specify a different position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> for each element.
trans-unit.target: Létrehozhat például egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>megosztható több elem, de a ContextMenuService osztály használatával adjon meg egy másik helyre, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>az egyes elemekhez.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and ContextMenuService classes.
If any of these properties are set on both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and the ContextMenuService, the property value from the ContextMenuService is used.
trans-unit.target: Ha ezeket a tulajdonságokat bármelyikét beállítják mindkét <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, és a ContextMenuService, a ContextMenuService tulajdonság értékét használja.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A> You can also use the ContextMenuService to display menus on disabled items.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A>Menük képlistán letiltott elemek is használhatja a ContextMenuService.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HasDropShadow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTargetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A>

The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.

trans-unit.source: Object to query concerning whether it has a drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: Az objektum lekérdezés vonatkozó, hogy az vetett árnyékot rendelkezik.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value, **true** if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> has a drop shadow; **false** otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Logikai érték, **igaz** Ha a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> rendelkezik az vetett árnyékot; **hamis** más módon.
